@gurarie2017 present the idea of correlated velocity models.

The idea is to model velocity (rate and directiond of motion) $\mathbf{v}(t)$ 
integrating velocity we can get locations

$$
\boldsymbol{\mu}(t) = \boldsymbol{\mu}(0) + \int_0^{t} \mathbf{v}(t')dt'
$$
